- Soffit: Aluminum perforated vented panels under roof overhang; no sag evident. Location: exterior eave underside.
- Fascia/trim: Metal fascia along roof edge; appears intact with no rot. Location: eave edge.
- Vegetation contact: Yucca/Dracaena plants touching wall and soffit; Location: base of wall beneath eave. Risk of moisture/pest access; trim back.
- Joint gap: Small gap at soffit-to-wall junction (left front corner); Location: left corner of eave. Consider resealing to prevent water intrusion.
- Exterior wiring: Small conduit/cable along wall beneath soffit; Location: wall surface near vent. Ensure proper weatherproofing and secure routing.
